Automatic uploading while not connected to WiFi will use your mobile data. This may result in charges from your network provider if you do not have a data plan. Speed alarm triggered Current alarm triggered Temperature alarm triggered Garmin ConnectIQ Enable connectivity to Garmin ConnectIQ Horn Mode Executed when the select button on the Pebble watch is pressed Tiltback speed Wheel speed limit 1st Alert Speed 2nd Alert Speed 3rd Alert Speed 4 beeps alarm 3 beeps alarm 2 beeps alarm Pedals Mode Leds mode Strobe Mode Light Mode On/Off On/Off/Auto On Off Charging Discharging Auto Strobe Disabled Enabled Hard Medium Soft On-board (KingSong) via bluetooth audio Application Settings Log Settings Alarm Settings Watch/Band Preferences Wheel Settings Trip Settings Reset top speed and PWM Reset battery sag Reset user distance Edit MAC address Edit profile name About WheelLog Settings A N*m Top limit of outer dial The maximum number shown on the outer dial (speed or current) Use MPH Show speed in miles rather than kilometers view_blocks_string Info blocks Show info blocks below speedometer Restart required Please restart the application to apply this change English Use English language instead of Android system language Improved percents Use better formula for battery percents calculation instead of wheel vendor formula Fixed percents. Use fixed formula for battery percents calculation instead of wheel vendor formula Tiltback voltage. Voltage per 1 cell, where the wheel tiltback the pedals Enable Picture-in-Picture Use Picture-in-Picture mode instead of going to background Current on main dial Draw current on main dial instead of speed Connect sound Play sound when Wheel connects or disconnects Connection lost beeps period Period of beeps when connection lost, 0sec - no beeps Auto mute Auto mute at speeds below 3.5 km/h Battery capacity Battery Capacity in Wh Charging power Charging Power in A Show Bluetooth without name. Show Bluetooth devices without name. Sound of connection. Sound of connection to the wheel. Enable Alarms Allow the phone to vibrate as a warning Disable Phone Vibration Phone will not vibrate but the alarm will be passed to a connected Pebble Watch Disable Phone Beep Phone will not beep but the alarm will be passed to a connected Pebble Watch Altered alarms Use altered alarms model based on voltage and capabilities of wheel Altered alarms options Rotation speed Rotation (lift-up) speed of your wheel Rotation voltage Voltage at which rotation speed was measured Power factor Don\'t change if you don\'t understand what is that, default=90 First alarm PWM Calculated PWM on which first alarm should occur Second alarm PWM Should be higher than first alarm Third alarm PWM Should be higher than second alarm Advance warning Advance speed warning, 0 - off Advance warning PWM Advance PWM warning, 0 - off Frequency of warnings Notification period, 0 - off Short display of PWM Current/Max PWM is displayed at about speed Speed Alarm 1 Speed that triggers the alarm Speed Alarm 2 Speed Alarm 3 Battery Percent Battery percent that activates the alarm Battery Percent Battery Percent Current Alarm Current Current that triggers the alarm Temperature Alarm Temperature Temperature that triggers the alarm speed current No data available Auto Log Start logging automatically when a wheel is connected Upload to electro.club Automatically upload log files to electro.club site. GPS must be turned on. Auto Upload Logs Automatically upload log files to Google Drive Log location Include location data within the logs Use GPS for location Use GPS for location rather than network provider. GPS is more accurate but may consume more battery power Write Raw data Off/On/Strobe Soft/Medium/Hard Alarm settings Alarm Mode Calibration Calibration success Calibration fail Ride mode change success Ride mode change fail Remote control success Remote control fail Light state change success Light state change fail Handle button success Handle button fail Speaker control success Speaker control fail My Wheel is a Gotway MCM If your wheel is Gotway MCM, and it shows wrong speed, distance and others parameters, it should make them normal Wrong 18L distanse 18L use to show wrong distance, WheelLog corrects this number, but if you want to see wrong raw numbers from wheel - check this Battery voltage 67V/84V/100V Negative current and speed mode When you riding straight if speed and currents negative - try change to opposite setting, or choose absolute Absolute (only positive) Reverse Straight 35 km/h + 80% PWM 80% PWM only 30 + 35 km/h + 80% PWM m Switch on the light Activate headlight Switch on wheel illumination Activate leds on the sides Disable handle button Wheel will not disable when you press the button on the handle Speaker volume Change built-in speaker volume Pedals Horizontal pedals adjustment Ride mode Enable - Classic/Offroad, Disable - Comfort/Commuting Pedals sensivity Bigger number - more sensitive Wheel settings for Ninebot Z not available yet V W Battery 1 Battery 2 S/N FW Factory capacity Actual capacity Full cycles Charge count Mfg date Status Remain capacity Percent Current Voltage Temp 1 Temp 2 Health Cell 1 Cell 2 Cell 3 Cell 4 Cell 5 Cell 6 Cell 7 Cell 8 Cell 9 Cell 10 Cell 11 Cell 12 Cell 13 Cell 14 Cell 15 Cell 16 Password E-mail show_page_events Show the events page Events page Main view Beep Beep on single tap A single tap on the main screen will play a beep Beep on volume keys The volume buttons will play a beep. [ec] Choose an transport Private policy I read and agree MAC address This app collects location data to enable GPS data in CSV logs when WheelLog is running in the background or when the screen is off. GPS data is not collected when EUC is disconnected. Share Upload to electro.club Trips page Enable DRL Enable front O-ring and backlight Light brightness Brightness of headlight Enable fan Turn fan on Quiet fan mode Fan will turn on only when riding, but headlight brightness will be decreased to 40% when idle Mute Mute wheel speaker Fancier mode This mode for experienced riders, maximum speed - 55km/h Go Home mode Enables to ride at low battery condition Transport mode This mode prevents wheel from starting motor during transportation Lock mode Lock the wheel Permission to read the file is denied audio files not found Theme UI theme of Wheellog Dark mode Use phone settings Day theme Night theme Actions: notification_buttons Notification buttons Light icon Mi Band icon Start MiBand Alert Max Current Max Power [SPEED] \n - %1$.0f k/h \n - %2$.0f max \n\n[POWER] \n - %3$d %% \n\n[TRIP] \n - %4$.1f km [SPEED] \n - %1$.0f k/h \n - %2$.0f avg \n - %3$.0f pwm \n\n[OTHER] \n - %4$d %% \n - %5$d ¬∞C \n - %6$.1f km [SPEED] \n ‚≠ê %1$.0f k/h \n üî• %2$.0f top \n üôà %3$.0f avg \n\n[POWER] \n üíß %4$d %% \n ‚ö° %5$.2f V \n üí™ %6$.0f W \n ‚ùÑ %7$d ¬∞C \n\n[TRIP] \n üë£ %8$.1f km [DATA] \n - %1$.0f k/h \n - %2$.1f A \n - %3$.2f V \n - %4$d %% \n - %5$d ¬∞C Alarm data: %1$.0f k/h | %2$.1f A | %3$.2f V | %4$d %% | %5$d ¬∞C %1$.0f km/h | %2$d %% | %3$.0f W | %4$d¬∞C | %5$.3f km Alarm!
